note.p: German agriculturalist and promoter of alpine tourism. In the late 1840s, studied agriculture, ecology, and natural science at Berlin. Bought the manor at Sagschütz bei Breslau, where he was a sheep-breeder, 1850. Bought an estate at Zell am See, 1868. Chairman, Pinzgau alpine club, 1871. Responsible for building several mountain paths and guest-houses and organising guided climbing in the area.
